title: vAkkilirundu jnAna
sahitya:
vAkkilirundu jnAna mazhai pozhivAi shakti vANiyE nityakalyANiyE bhArati


anupallavi

  nOkkum iDamellAm nUtana kATSigaL Ukki ennuLLattil OngiDak-kalai inbam


caraNam 1    engengu shenrAlum ennuDan irundu nI iniya nallanbarai Ind-unnaruTp-paNiyai
angangu niravETri akhila ulagamellAm Anma nEyamAkki AdarittaruL tAyE
    caraNam 2    shuddha shaktiyE sutantarap-poruLE sUriya jyOtiyir shuDar viDum aruLE nittiya yOga 
samAjattil ninnoLi nilavuga deivIkap-pulamaigaL viLangavE talamellAm poliyavE nAnlam vaLaravE
